name: A Game About A Game About A Game...
name_original: A Game About A Game About A Game...
description:
When we make a game, we cycle between losing and finding our inspiration, our motivation. Sometimes it's easy to keep going, sometimes we have to slog through. It gets better, it gets worse and, finally, it gets done.

Watch, listen and feel the world improve and devolve around you, as you come on this game-making journey with us.

This game was made in 48hrs, for the Global Game Jam 2021. 

Programming: James Poole

Music and Sound Effects: Laura Ryder

Art & Design: Brendan Hewson & Niamh Germaine
